original_text: Then Daniel went in, and desired of the king that he would give him time, and that he would shew the king the interpretation.
korean_text: 다니엘이 들어가서 왕께 구하기를 시간을 주시면 왕에게 그 해석을 알려 드리리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: that he would give him time
and that he would shew the king the interpretation
